column4: I'm trying to play .avi with totem why I dont get any video screening?
why did I install amd64 version :D
so is there any way to play .avi files with am64?
yes, you can setup a 32bit chroot or maybe there is also another way. check the forums in the amd64 section. The easiest way, however is to simply use the i386 version of Ubuntu
I used to use amd64 but switched to i386 and that's what I recommend to everyone for now
reinstalling with i386 would have been quicker
